short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes all items from the Amazon and Flipkart cart. Also removes Save Later items

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily manage your Amazon and Flipkart shopping carts with Cart Cleaner! This extension allows you to remove all items from your cart with a single click. Additionally, it provides options to clear out "Saved for Later" items on both platforms, streamlining your online shopping experience. Say goodbye to multiple clicks and manual cart managementâ€”Cart Cleaner handles it for you, saving time and reducing clutter.

Key Features:

One-click removal of all items from your Amazon or Flipkart cart
Separate controls to clear "Saved for Later" items
Simple, user-friendly interface for effortless cart management
Keep your shopping cart organized and clutter-free with Cart Cleaner!
